title: Data Science
text: Utilizes data analytics, machine learning, and AI to extract insights from healthcare data for improved decision-making.

title: Blockchain
text: Implements secure and immutable storage of healthcare records using blockchain technology for data integrity and privacy.

title: Cloud Computing
text: Utilizes cloud infrastructure for secure and scalable storage, processing, and analysis of healthcare data and applications.

title: Virtual Reality
text: Develops immersive experiences and training simulations for healthcare professionals, enhancing training and surgical planning.

title: Augmented Reality
text: Creates augmented reality solutions to enhance visualization and assist in medical procedures and training for healthcare providers.

title: Mixed Reality
text: Combines virtual and augmented reality to create interactive and immersive healthcare experiences for training and patient education.

title: Telemedicine
text: Creates software platforms for remote consultations, video conferencing, and virtual care, improving accessibility and convenience.

title: Electronic Health Records
text: Designs secure and user-friendly EHR systems for efficiently managing patient records, treatment plans, and clinical workflows.
